profile.name: Carlos Antonio da Silva
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Atlassian | Contributing to Open-Source Projects
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for web development, open-source contributions, and collaboration.
profile.company:
Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following employer:

Atlassian

Reasons:
1

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented new features for the Portal Game on Elixir, utilizing database sharding techniques.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve complex bugs and improve overall system performance.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed a personal website using Ruby on Rails, showcasing expertise in web development and design.
Contributed to open-source projects such as Heartcombo/Devise and Judoscale/Judoscale-python.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated the Heartcombo/Devise gem, ensuring compatibility with various Ruby versions.

experience.title: Concurrent-Ruby Developer
description: Developed concurrent-ruby, a library for concurrent programming in Ruby.
Collaborated with other developers to improve the library's performance and stability.
